name: Homeland
summary: The winner of 6 Emmy Awards including Outstanding Drama Series, Homeland is an edge-of-your-seat sensation. Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody is both a decorated hero and a serious threat. CIA officer Carrie Mathison is tops in her field despite being bipolar. The delicate dance these two complex characters perform, built on lies, suspicion, and desire, is at the heart of this gripping, emotional thriller in which nothing short of the fate of our nation is at stake.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.summary: In the opener of this "Manchurian Candidate"-like political thriller, a marine rescued after eight years as a POW in Afghanistan returns home a war hero. But a CIA operative suspects he may actually be an enemy agent with a connection to Al Qaeda and part of a plan to commit a terrorist act on U.S. soil.

episodes.name: Grace
episodes.summary: An undercover agent with connections to a Saudi prince who may be funding terrorist activities provides Carrie with a revealing bit of electronic evidence. Meanwhile, Carrie studies surveillance footage of life in Brody's home, where he appears troubled by traumatic memories and resists Pentagon and media pressure to be hyped as an American war hero.

episodes.name: Clean Skin
episodes.summary: An exclusive television interview will thrust the Brody family into the national spotlight, unless Dana pulls off her plan to sidetrack the whole bogus process. Elsewhere, Carrie and the team sniff out an Al Qaeda attack on American soil; and Carrie's embedded operative in Prince Farid's camp gets trapped in a chilling situation.

episodes.name: Semper I
episodes.summary: Political powers make big plans to promote Brody as a national hero, but erratic behavior on his part threatens his media image. Elsewhere, a desperate Carrie searches for evidence to link Brody with Abu Nazir, while Saul enjoins her to follow the terrorist financier's money trail.

episodes.name: Blind Spot
episodes.summary: Carrie believes her suspicions about Brody may be proven correct when he confronts the sole survivor of the insurgents who held him hostage. But the reunion ultimately raises more questions. Meanwhile, the agency zeros in on Aileen and Faisel, the lovers who used funds from the stolen jewelry to purchase the house near the airport.

episodes.name: The Good Soldier
episodes.summary: Having lost a number of essential personnel to Nazir's terrorist plot against the U.S., the CIA issue polygraph tests on everyone who had contact with them. This includes Brody, which Carrie hopes will reveal the truth about him.

episodes.name: The Weekend
episodes.summary: Carrie and Brody spend a weekend in the countryside, which ends up complicating their relationship further. Elsewhere, Jessica and Mike catch flak about the truth behind their relationship, while Saul catches Aileen hightailing it to Mexico.

episodes.name: Achilles Heel
episodes.summary: While Carrie and Saul are left reeling by the news that Walker is alive, the intelligence organisations squabble over how to capture him. The FBI leans toward using the public's help, but Carrie thinks they should use his family to draw him out. Elsewhere, Brody sets out to find a mysterious man who has surprising info about his years as a captive.

episodes.name: Crossfire
episodes.summary: Brody's efforts to sever ties with Abu Nazir triggers flashbacks to his time as a captive. Meanwhile, the mosque shooting results in a public-relations nightmare for Carrie.

episodes.name: Representative Brody
episodes.summary: Walker's Washington contact is identified by Carrie and Saul, but the target is protected via diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, political bigwigs approach Brody about running for a disgraced congressman's seat.

episodes.name: The Vest
episodes.summary: When the dust settles from an explosion, Saul finds a manic Carrie hospitalised and realises there may be merit to her wild theories. Meanwhile, with his congressional campaign set to kick off, Brody takes the family on a weekend getaway to Gettysburg, where he obtains an important item.

episodes.name: Marine One
episodes.summary: In the Season 1 finale, a near-catatonic Carrie is confined to bed as Saul puzzles over the unnerving implications of her time line. Elsewhere, Walker settles on a perch from which to complete his mission; and Brody preps for the vice president's policy summit.

episodes.name: The Smile
episodes.summary: In the Season 2 premiere, Brody learns he is the political "future of the party," and receives a tantalizing offer from the vice president, while a recovering Carrie receives a disturbing request from a surprising source. In Beirut, Saul gets involved in some cloak-and-dagger doings.

episodes.name: Beirut is Back
episodes.summary: Carrie reluctantly returns to Beirut and an operation that might possibly spell the end of Abu Nazir; back in Washington, Brody is pressed into service by his handler, and his relationship with Jessica deteriorates. Meanwhile, Capt. Mike Faber has questions about the shooting of Elizabeth Gaines.

episodes.name: State of Independence
episodes.summary: The results of Carrie's Beirut mission lead her to believe that she'll be rejoining the CIA; and Brody discovers that the bomb maker is on a watch list and in imminent danger of being caught. Meanwhile, Jessica steps into the political spotlight.

episodes.name: New Car Smell
episodes.summary: Estes green-lights a covert mission based on intelligence gleaned from Beirut, and picks his own trusted operative to lead it; and Brody is shocked to bump into Carrie at Langley. Meanwhile, Dana and the vice president's son appear to have something in common.

episodes.name: Q&A
episodes.summary: Brody finds himself prisoner again, but this time it's on American soil.

episodes.name: A Gettysburg Address
episodes.summary: Dana's visit to the hospital proves shocking; Faber's interest in Tom Walker piques the CIA's interest; Brody agrees to team with Carrie and Quinn to prevent an attack on the U.S., but his loyalty is called to the fore when Gettysburg once again becomes a focal point of a pivotal engagement.

episodes.name: The Clearing
episodes.summary: In the aftermath of the ambush, Carrie and the team scramble to gain control of the operation, while Brody attends a well-heeled fund-raiser at a Virginia horse farm. Elsewhere, Saul drops in on Aileen, who is in solitary confinement, hoping she can shed some light on the latest attack; and a conflicted Dana leans on Finn to fess up to their crime.

episodes.name: I'll Fly Away
episodes.summary: Brody's juggling of alliances appear to be leading him to a major meltdown, so Carrie, against Quinn's orders, stages a dicey intervention. Meanwhile, a conflicted Dana seeks comfort from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Two Hats
episodes.summary: Things for Brody are threatening to spiral out of control, forcing him to make a phone call he has been avoiding; Carrie preps for a pivotal meeting; Saul teams with Virgil and Max for an assignment.

episodes.name: Broken Hearts
episodes.summary: Brody and Walden develop a chink in their political relationship, and it may impact their future, while Dana and Finn come to an understanding concerning their differences. Meanwhile, Carrie discovers she's not as looped in as she thought.

episodes.name: In Memoriam
episodes.summary: Carrie's hunt for Nazir continues, but she suspects something's amiss inside the Agency, while interrogation reveals Roya's true colours. Meanwhile, unexpected circumstances put Saul's career in jeopardy

episodes.name: The Choice
episodes.summary: In the Series 2 finale, Carrie is faced with a pivotal decision, while Brody meets with Faber to contemplate the future of the family. Meanwhile, Saul undertakes a secret assignment; and Quinn has a decision to make that may prove to be a game-changer.

episodes.name: Tin Man is Down
episodes.summary: Season 3 begins with Brody remaining at large, while Carrie is called to testify before a senate committee investigating the terrorist bombing in Washington, D.C. Meanwhile, Saul takes command at the CIA; and the Brody family deal with a tragic occurrence.

episodes.name: Uh... Oh... Ah...
episodes.summary: Saul attempts to track down those responsible for the Langley attack and recruits an unlikely expert to follow the money trail. Meanwhile, Quinn takes matters into his own hands; Carrie learns who is really on her side; and the Brody family turn to therapy to mend their broken household.

episodes.name: Tower of David
episodes.summary: Brody returns to his faith for guidance in an unexpected way when he finds himself facing increasingly desperate straits. Back in the U.S., Carrie struggles to connect with Saul when a mysterious man offers to help her but at a significant cost.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.summary: Carrie meets a new client over breakfast and learns that the crippled CIA can still exercise power when needed. Meanwhile, Dana runs away and Jessica seeks the police's help in finding her; and Saul follows the money trail to an unexpected location.

episodes.name: The Yoga Play
episodes.summary: A mysterious man enters the country at the U.S.-Canadian border; Carrie puts her mission on the line to do a risky favor; Saul is forced to socialize with his adversary, Sen. Lockhart, on an elite hunting trip; Dana makes a shocking discovery that could end her getaway for good.

episodes.name: Still Positive
episodes.summary: Carrie turns the tables on the mastermind of the Langley bombing and recruits one of Iran's most powerful operatives. Meanwhile, Saul struggles to keep an intrusive Sen. Lockhart at bay; and Dana makes a radical decision that changes her family forever.

episodes.name: Gerontion
episodes.summary: With his old adversary in custody, Saul makes the gamble of his career. Meanwhile, Carrie and Quinn scramble to contain a local police investigation; and Mira comes to a crossroad in her marriage.

episodes.name: A Red Wheelbarrow
episodes.summary: Carrie and Quinn pursue a key suspect in the Langley bombing; Saul faces political backlash; Fara discovers the high toll that an intelligence job can take; the Brody family receive startling news.

episodes.name: One Last Thing
episodes.summary: Carrie reunites with Brody, but the circumstances are more difficult than either of them imagined. Meanwhile, Saul gets a win from an unlikely source; and Dana struggles with her new life away from home.

episodes.name: Good Night
episodes.summary: Brody embarks on a high-stakes mission, but his fragile condition threatens the operation. Meanwhile, Quinn makes an uncomfortable discovery about Carrie; and Fara is forced to rejoin the team due to a sudden crisis.

episodes.name: Big Man in Tehran
episodes.summary: Brody's loyalty to the mission wavers when he meets a ghost from his past. Meanwhile, Lockhart's confirmation looms; and Saul stares into the precipice between success and failure.

episodes.name: The Star
episodes.summary: Season 3 ends with security forces closing in on Carrie and Brody, and Brody struggling to find redemption. Meanwhile, Saul plans a last-ditch rescue mission.

episodes.name: The Drone Queen
episodes.summary: Carrie makes a vital choice when her counterpart in Islamabad gives her urgent intelligence resulting in a media disaster. Saul has issues with his new position/job.

episodes.name: Trylon and Perisphere
episodes.summary: An inquiry brings Carrie back to the US where she has issues debating between her motherhood duties and her commitment to solving the drone strike issue. Quinn becomes more mentally unstable and an old case worker reveals new information.

episodes.name: Shalwar Kameez
episodes.summary: Carrie attempts to recruit an asset and leaves the US again. Quinn has further issues and communicates with the lady he previous protected and the CIA question his resignation.

episodes.name: Iron in the Fire
episodes.summary: Carrie gets a tip from Redmond regarding Quinn's lead. Saul calls in a favor with an old friend in the Pakistani military. Fara uncovers a deep-rooted conspiracy.

episodes.name: About a Boy
episodes.summary: Carrie tries to earn the trust of a frightened asset. On his way out of town, Saul catches a break when he spots a familiar face. Quinn and Fara stake out a new suspect.

episodes.name: From A to B and Back Again
episodes.summary: Carrie puts her operation in motion.

episodes.name: Redux
episodes.summary: Lockhart arrives in Islamabad to help negotiate Saul's release. Meanwhile, Carrie's investigation gets complicated as she deals with Saul's situation, the search for a hospital employee with the key to Haqqani's true medical condition and a serious threat to her own sharp focus.

episodes.name: Halfway to a Donut
episodes.summary: Carrie organizes a last-ditch operation. Lockhart and Martha stall the ISI.

episodes.name: There's Something Else Going On
episodes.summary: Carrie improvises to salvage her mission; the CIA closes in on a leak

episodes.name: 13 Hours in Islamabad
episodes.summary: The security breach at the Embassy has far reaching consequences.

episodes.name: Krieg Nicht Lieb
episodes.summary: Carrie puts her life on the line to get her team out of Pakistan.

episodes.name: Long Time Coming
episodes.summary: Series 4 ends with Carrie and Saul returning to the U.S. and investigating what she saw in Islamabad.

episodes.name: Separation Anxiety
episodes.summary: While Carrie tries to build a new life in Berlin, a request from her boss forces her back into the world she abandoned.

episodes.name: The Tradition of Hospitality
episodes.summary: Carrie and Düring visit a refugee camp. Saul and Allison are at odds.

episodes.name: Super Powers
episodes.summary: Jonas and Carrie revisit her past. Quinn stalks his prey.

episodes.name: Why is This Night Different?
episodes.summary: Answers elude Carrie; Laura asks Jonas for help; Saul and Allison run an operation.

episodes.name: Better Call Saul
episodes.summary: The hacktivists rise up; Quinn covers for Carrie; Dar and Allison assess the damage.

episodes.name: Parabiosis
episodes.summary: Saul orders a sweep at the station. Carrie looks to Düring for support.

episodes.name: Oriole
episodes.summary: Carrie reconnects with old friends; Saul opens up to Allison.

episodes.name: All About Allison
episodes.summary: Carrie needs Allison's help. Quinn's plans change.

episodes.name: The Litvinov Ruse
episodes.summary: The CIA and BND make a play.

episodes.name: New Normal
episodes.summary: A new threat emerges.

episodes.name: Our Man in Damascus
episodes.summary: Carrie follows a lead.

episodes.name: A False Glimmer
episodes.summary: The clock runs out.

episodes.name: Fair Game
episodes.summary: Carrie and Franny live in Brooklyn where Carrie works as an advocate for Muslim Americans. Dar and Saul brief President-elect Keane. Quinn struggles with his new circumstances.

episodes.name: The Man in the Basement
episodes.summary: Carrie and Reda fight for their client while Quinn fights against his new life. Saul and Dar suspect Keane has a secret.

episodes.name: The Covenant
episodes.summary: Saul goes to Abu Dhabi. Carrie delivers bad news. Quinn senses something.

episodes.name: A Flash of Light
episodes.summary: Carrie handles her client. Saul's trip takes a turn. Quinn investigates.

episodes.name: Casus Belli
episodes.summary: Keane gets sidelined. Carrie's work follows her home.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.summary: Carrie follows a lead. Saul meets an old friend. Keane takes a stand.

episodes.name: Imminent Risk
episodes.summary: Carrie gets bad news. Saul makes a plan. Quinn accepts his situation.

episodes.name: Alt.Truth
episodes.summary: Carrie and Saul present evidence to Keane. Quinn tracks a mark.

episodes.name: Sock Puppets
episodes.summary: Carrie catches a break. Keane makes a plan. Max goes undercover.

episodes.name: The Flag House
episodes.summary: Dar plays his hand. Quinn revisits his past.

episodes.name: R is for Romeo
episodes.summary: Carrie and Quinn make a discovery. Keane makes a decision. Max finds trouble.

episodes.name: America First
episodes.summary: Pieces fall into place. Season finale.

episodes.name: Enemy of the State
episodes.summary: Carrie and Franny are living with Maggie's family in DC. Saul and the federal employees detained after the attempt on the President-elect's life are in prison. President Keane's administration comes under scrutiny.

episodes.name: Rebel Rebel
episodes.summary: Carrie makes a discovery. Wellington protects Keane. O'Keefe continues to broadcast.

episodes.name: Standoff
episodes.summary: Carrie has a distressing realization. Saul negotiates. Keane and Wellington disagree.

episodes.name: Like Bad at Things
episodes.summary: Carrie follows a lead. Saul's situation goes from bad to worse.

episodes.name: Active Measures
episodes.summary: Carrie puts a plan in motion. Saul visits a source. Keane makes a desperate plea.

episodes.name: Species Jump
episodes.summary: Saul calls an old friend. Wellington has a problem. Carrie enjoys a win.

episodes.name: Andante
episodes.summary: Carrie makes a move. Wellington has a reckoning. Saul expands an operation.

episodes.name: Lies, Amplifiers, F**king Twitter
episodes.summary: Carrie and Saul interrogate a suspect. Wellington makes a play.

episodes.name: Useful Idiot
episodes.summary: Carrie has problems at home. Saul and Wellington work on Paley.

episodes.name: Clarity
episodes.summary: Carrie needs to choose a side. Keane needs an ally. Saul has an idea.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.summary: Saul's mission is a go. The clock ticks on the Keane administration.

episodes.name: Paean to the People
episodes.summary: Carrie and Saul's mission doesn't go as planned. Elizabeth Keane fights for her presidency.

episodes.name: Deception Indicated
episodes.summary: Carrie recovers in Germany. Saul negotiates. Max has a new mission.

episodes.name: Catch and Release
episodes.summary: Carrie reconnects with an old ally. Tasneem seeks counsel. Saul finds hope.

episodes.name: False Friends
episodes.summary: Carrie arranges a meeting. Haqqani finds trouble at home. Saul cuts a deal.

episodes.name: Chalk One Up
episodes.summary: Saul plans an announcement. Carrie gets a surprise.

episodes.name: Chalk Two Down
episodes.summary: Carrie chases answers. Max attempts a rescue. G'ulom takes an opportunity.

episodes.name: Two Minutes
episodes.summary: Upheaval in Washington brings an investigation to Kabul.

episodes.name: F**ker Shot Me
episodes.summary: Saul finds an unlikely ally. So does Carrie.

episodes.name: Threnody(s)
episodes.summary: Carrie waits. Wellington makes a discovery.

episodes.name: In Full Flight
episodes.summary: Hayes has ideas. Carrie goes shopping. Tasneem has problems.

episodes.name: Designated Driver
episodes.summary: No one admits to anything.

episodes.name: The English Teacher
episodes.summary: Saul backchannels. Carrie needs one more favor.

episodes.name: Prisoners of War
episodes.summary: Events surrounding Saul and Carrie's final mission come to a conclusion.
